mapper.select: SELECT article_id "article_id", article_title "article_title", IF((DATEDIFF(NOW(),DATE_FORMAT(article_date,'%Y-%m-%d %T'))) <1,DATE_FORMAT(article_date,'%T'),DATE_FORMAT(article_date,'%Y-%m-%d')) "article_date", article_view "article_view", user_id "user_id", user_name "user_name" FROM articles NATURAL JOIN users WHERE ${search_flag} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_content},'%') ORDER BY articles.article_date DESC LIMIT 5 OFFSET ${offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) "articles_total" FROM articles WHERE ${search_flag} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_content},'%')
